name: HavellsSync
0:
”Alexa , turn on Water Heater”
”Alexa , turn off Water Heater”
”Alexa, set Water Heater to 30 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: havells
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If you experience any issues while using the Havells-Sync skill, please reach out to us at feedback@havells.com.

The Havells-Sync skill for Amazon Alexa enables seamless control of your home appliances, making it quick and easy to manage them with voice commands
Now, You do not need to turn on the switch manually on the product. You can ask Alexa to turn on, turn off, set the temperature of the Water Heater after syncing the product. You can use Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap, or Echo Show.
